iwacu_expl: Intego nyamukuru yama Clubs Iwacu nukubaka ubushobozi bwinshi no kungurana ubumenyi, hagamijwe guhuza abantu nâ€™imiryango itandukanye mubihugu batuyemo
share_knowledge_expl: Uko usangira ubumenyi bwawe, ibitekerezo byawe nubuhanga bwawe, niko urushaho kugira uruhare mugutezimbere umuryango wawe no mukubaka isi nziza yuzuye uburumbuke aho uzaba uwambere ubyungukiramo
baza_impuguke_expl: Baza ikibazo cyawe tugishyikirize Impuguke ibishinzwe, hanyuma tuguhuze nawe
news_expl: Twohereze amakuru cyangwa inkuru yihutirwa, tuyimenyekanishe kandi tutisangize abo ireba bose
